name: Perpetual (Shivam1321)
description:
This game is developed by shivam AKA ch34tc0d3

This is a infinite 2d platformer game. This game is developed in unity and is under heavy development. The full version of the game will be released in 2019. This is just a demo of a game for #GithubGameOff . 

Any suggestion is crutial at this stage. I need as many suggestion as possible because this is my first game.
